title: Svartlebee's Woundseeker
content: Svartlebee's Woundseeker Uncommon 3~13 Damage 2d6 +1 Slashing Deepen the Wound: The wielder gains a +1d4 bonus to Attack Rolls with this weapon when attacking creatures that have already taken damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Wielded by Svartlebee The Custodian, so named because he had the following reputation: Have you got someone in your life causing a mess? Send Suartlebee a missive. He shall clean them up, and then clean up the crime scene. Greatsword
